finding.title: Emotion in Reinforcement Learning Agents and Robots: A Survey
finding.description: This article provides the first survey of computational models of emotion in reinforcement learning (RL) agents. The survey focuses on agent/robot emotions, and mostly ignores human user emotions. Emotions are recognized as functional in decision-making by influencing motivation and action selection.
